FitSpresso Ingredients: What Makes It Effective?

Based on expert concepts of pharmacology where the keyword ‘super-additive synergy’ becomes relevant, five ingredients combined with coffee were proven to accelerate the metabolism of your body. 

You can find these FitSpresso ingredients that are similar and their various properties here:

Chlorogenic Acid- Extracted from raw, fresh coffee berries, CGA has been significantly shown to reduce body mass indices. It stimulates your metabolism and keeps the fat-burning window open for longer. 

L-Carnitine- This amino acid derivative can initiate fat oxidation and convert fat into energy levels. It is used to treat metabolic syndromes and harnesses muscle strength as well. 

EGCG- A special kind of catechin found in green tea, EGCG can reduce inflammation and has powerful antioxidant properties. This FitSpresso ingredient supports healthy metabolism and keeps fat-burning windows open for prolonged times.

Chromium- Chromium is a trace mineral that breaks down protein and fat in your body. It controls blood sugar andsupports heart health.

L-Theanine- Combined with coffee, l-theanine sharpens your mental acuity and focus. This FitSpresso ingredient improves sleep, aids in relaxation, and promotes weight loss.

Science Behind Fitspresso Weight Reduction Formula

A proper investigation of the research studies that back up the claims of the FitSpresso weight reduction supplement will help you evaluate its legitimacy in a much clearer way. 

As mentioned earlier, the FitSpresso capsule works based on triggering the fat-burning windows and prolonging the duration of these windows. A research study published in the Irish Journal of Medical Sciences has valid proof for this.

It explains that like your body, your adipose cells also have a circadian rhythm, intervals in which fat-burning is done in a much more effective manner. FitSpresso formula bases its work on caffeine consumption and metabolic activities.
